Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe it could be a valuable asset to your endeavors, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities. Considering its unique features and the extensive research and development that went into its creation, we're offering this extraordinary product to you at an exclusive price of $20000. This is an opportunity not only to acquire a high-quality item but also to potentially enhance your operations or personal projects significantly. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or have any questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
